markdownRemark.html: The Club is located in Calle La Colina s / n of Torremolinos, 600 meters from the beach of Los Alamos and Playamar with the best climate of the Costa del Sol. The facilities includes- 5 totally new glass padel courts with artificial grass, tennis court, indoor soccer field with artificial grass, garden area for events and celebrations with tropical beach bar, 300 m 2 restaurant bar completely new with modernist design and glass enclosures that give full visibility to the tennis and football courts.
